tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: Proposed IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Taxonomy for public comment

tp:license.name: The IFRS Taxonomy - Terms and Conditions

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined entry-point IFRS Sustainable Disclosure Standards and Industry Metrics
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for viewing the IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Taxonomy for all IFRS Sustainability Disclosures, including IFRS S2 Industry Metrics disclosures.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS Sustainable Disclosure Standards entry-point
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for viewing the IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Taxonomy for all IFRS Sustainability Disclosures.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS S2 industry metrics entry-point
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for viewing the IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Taxonomy for IFRS Industry Metrics Disclosures in IFRS S2 Climate Disclosures.
